@RS2User_14561 wrote:

You want to just remove the NPC from the server? Go into Autospawn.cfg, find the NPC, and delete that line of code.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Removing ~ R€P reward
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Here is a good way:

Add this

public void telecats() { for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) { if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) { if(server.npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 785){ npcs[i].absX = 0; npcs[i].absY = 0; server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0; } } } }
This teles the cats to absx 0 absy 0

And in

if (NPCID == 765) { //Pickup cat PutNPCCoords = true; sendMessage("you pickup your cat."); addItem(7585, 1);
Add telecats();

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Removing ~ R€P reward
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

hi,

I am working full pet’s skill but now i am stuck ^.^ when i realse my pet ( item ) i make it change to a npc

(like this)

if(playerHasItemAmount (7585, 1)){ sendMessage("You released you pet."); deleteItem(7585, getItemSlot(7585), 1); SummonNewNPC(765);

but now i want it make so that whne i pickup the cat the npc goes away
i already goth this :

if (NPCID == 765) { //Pickup cat PutNPCCoords = true; sendMessage("you pickup your cat."); addItem(7585, 1);

Help me out ^.^
[size=15pt]PLEAS NOTE : MY source is 100% deleted from Atacking ( mage , range , melee)[/size]
